Key Match Events: Suryakumar Yadav smashed six fours and as many sixes to post 68 not out in just 26 balls.
Virat Kohli brought up his fifty off 40 balls and slog-swept Ehsan Khan for a 91-metre six.
Ravindra Jadeja hurt Hong Kong with a run-out and the wicket of Babar Hayat.
Post-Match Reflections: A blazing half-century from Suryakumar Yadav, and a more sedate one from Virat Kohli, helped India cruise into the Super 4 round of the Asia Cup.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The victory ensured India would finish as the top team in Group A.
Apart from a slow start, Avesh Khan and Arshdeep Singh looked off colour. Avesh gave away 53 from his four overs, and Arshdeep went for 44 from his quota.
